name: Bouncy Bit Go!
description:
The sequel to Bouncy Bit is here! How high can you bounce?

Bouncy Bit Go is an addictive one touch jump game sure to test your reflexes and timing. Can you get all the way to the the ultra hard and exciting endless mode? Take a shot and see if you can bounce with the best of them!

[Game Features]

-Simple one tap jump controls
-Unlock all the skins and get a free exclusive skin for ios!
-Conquer 10 sections to reach the super-hard endless rage mode
-Share a screenshot of your score with friends and show off your bouncing majesty!
